---
title: mt5
tags: java

---

```java

package MorningTest;

public class mt5 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		//1번
		for(int j =0; j <11; j++){
			System.out.println();
			for(int i =0; i <11; i++)
				if(i==j) {
					System.out.printf("%c", '○');
				}
				else
				System.out.printf("%c", '┼');
		}
		System.out.println("1번 과제 출력완료");
		
		System.out.println();
		//2번
		for(int j =0; j <11; j++){
			System.out.println();
			for(int i =0; i <11; i++)
				if(i==j || i+j == 10) {
					System.out.printf("%c", '○');
				}
				else
				System.out.printf("%c", '┼');
		}
				
		    System.out.println("2번 과제 출력완료");

			//3번
		
		for(int j =0; j <11; j++) {
			System.out.println();
			for(int i =0; i <11; i++) 
				if(i==j || i+j == 10)
					System.out.printf("%c", '○');
				else if(j>5 && (0<= j-i) && (10-i)<=j)
				System.out.printf("%c", '○');
				else
				System.out.printf("%c", '┼');
		}
		
		}
		
		
	}//main
	





```
